bio: Dynamic and results-oriented Tech Lead with over a decade of experience in designing, developing, and deploying high-quality software solutions. Currently leading talented teams at Twire. Passionate about leveraging modern technologies like React and Python with FastAPI to build innovative and scalable applications.

projects.title: Project One: React-Powered Dashboard
projects.description: A sophisticated data visualization dashboard built with React for the frontend and a high-performance FastAPI backend. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

projects.title: Project Two: Enterprise .NET Solution
projects.description:
I worked for three years at an international elastic production and manufacturing facility in Sri Lanka, developing their internal production systems. I specialized in inventory management, finance, and supply chain management systems.
The company operated multiple micro-systems built using various .NET technologies, including:

Windows desktop applications
ASP.NET web applications
Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) desktop applications
Legacy Visual Basic applications

During my tenure, I contributed to over 25 projects and also participated in system implementation at their manufacturing plant in Bangladesh.
Technical Stack:

Database: Microsoft SQL Server
Reporting: SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and Crystal Reports
